attributes.action: Reduce the legal age of buying cigarettes to 16
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As of the 1st October 2007 the legal age to buy cigarettes was put up to 18.
Personally this is unfair for the 16 and 17 year olds that are used to purchasing cigarettes have to wait another year or so untill they can purchase them, once again.

The warnings have been exposed in newspapers and on tobacco goods themselves, if 16's or over do not wish to take any notice of these warnings and future consequences that is their own personal choice.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
